text: Worms is a video game where the player controls little cartoon worms who fight with weapons. There are many games in this series. It has guns and other weapons, but is not very violent because it is all cartoons. ==References== == Other websites == * Worms series * * Official Worms 2 website * Official Worms Armageddon website * Official Worms World Party website * Official Worms 3D website * Official Worms Forts website * Official Worms 4: Mayhem website * Official Worms website â€“ information on older releases Category:1994 video games Category:Amiga games Category:DOS games Category:Game Boy games Category:PlayStation games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Sega Saturn games Category:Strategy video games Category:Super Nintendo Entertainment System games
title: Worms (1995 video game)
